name: Kira
description: Lose yourself in a Faerie workshop full of mysterious structures, magical devices, and colorful beasts. This is a mini-experience designed to highlight the immersive qualities of VR for friends and family, allowing them to explore each nook and cranny of a fantasy scene.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K 3.50 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10, 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 Processor Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or better Storage: 500 MB available space
